alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:28AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern New Hanover and southeastern Brunswick Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 328 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oak Island, Kure Beach, Caswell Beach, Yaupon Beach, St. James, Southport, Fort Fisher and Dosher Memorial Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EDT for southeastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick
